patthana1.16:1.1_0: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— micchattaniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.16:2.1_0: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— micchattaniyate khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.16:3.1_0: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca micchattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—micchattaniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.16:4.1_0: Sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana1.16:5.1_0: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—aniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.16:5.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe aniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana1.16:5.1_3: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā;
patthana1.16:5.1_6: Mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana1.16:6.1_0: Micchattaniyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—micchattaniyate khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.16:7.1_0: Sammattaniyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—sammattaniyate khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.16:8.1_0: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—micchattaniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.16:9.1_0: Sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—sammattaniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.16:10.1_0: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—aniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.16:10.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe aniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.16:11.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye nava, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme nava, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne nava, magge nava, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate tīṇi, avigate nava.
patthana1.16:13.1_0: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ aniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.16:13.1_8: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.16:14.1_0: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā— micchattaniyate khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.16:15.1_0: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—micchattaniyate khandhe paṭicca micchattaniyatādhipati.
patthana1.16:16.1_0: Sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—sammattaniyate khandhe paṭicca sammattaniyatādhipati.
patthana1.16:17.1_0: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—aniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.16:17.1_3: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā;
patthana1.16:18.1_0: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati naanantarapaccayā.
patthana1.16:19.1_0: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.16:21.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare nasamanantare naaññamaññe naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.16:23.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṁ, anantare ekaṁ, samanantare ekaṁ, sahajāte ekaṁ …pe…
patthana1.16:26.1_0: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana1.16:27.1_0: Sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana1.16:28.1_0: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—aniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.16:28.1_3: khandhe paccayā vatthu, vatthuṁ paccayā khandhā;
patthana1.16:29.1_0: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā micchattaniyatā khandhā.
patthana1.16:30.1_0: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā sammattaniyatā khandhā.
patthana1.16:31.1_0: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā micchattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā micchattaniyatā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.16:32.1_0: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sammattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā sammattaniyatā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.16:33.1_0: Micchattaniyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṁ paccayā micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—micchattaniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.16:34.1_0: Micchattaniyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṁ paccayā aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—micchattaniyate khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.16:35.1_0: Micchattaniyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṁ paccayā micchattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—micchattaniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.16:35.1_2: micchattaniyate khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.16:36.1_0: Sammattaniyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṁ paccayā sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana1.16:37.1_0: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā …
patthana1.16:38.1_0: Hetuyā sattarasa, ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā sattarasa, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte sattarasa, aññamaññe satta, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye satta, purejāte satta, āsevane satta, kamme sattarasa, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre sattarasa, indriye sattarasa, jhāne sattarasa, magge sattarasa, sampayutte satta, vippayutte sattarasa, atthiyā sattarasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate sattarasa.
patthana1.16:40.1_0: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā aniyato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ aniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.16:40.1_3: khandhe paccayā vatthu, vatthuṁ paccayā khandhā.
patthana1.16:40.1_9: Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.16:41.1_0: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā aniyato dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā— micchattaniyate khandhe paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.16:42.1_0: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—micchattaniyate khandhe paccayā micchattaniyatādhipati.
patthana1.16:43.1_0: Sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—sammattaniyate khandhe paccayā sammattaniyatādhipati.
patthana1.16:44.1_0: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā aniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—aniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.16:45.1_0: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— vatthuṁ paccayā micchattaniyatādhipati.
patthana1.16:46.1_0: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— vatthuṁ paccayā sammattaniyatādhipati.
patthana1.16:47.1_0: Micchattaniyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṁ paccayā micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—micchattaniyate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā micchattaniyatādhipati.
patthana1.16:48.1_0: Sammattaniyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṁ paccayā sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—sammattaniyate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā sammattaniyatādhipati.
patthana1.16:49.1_0: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā aniyato dhammo uppajjati naanantarapaccayā …pe…
patthana1.16:50.1_0: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane pañca, nakamme satta, navipāke sattarasa, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye najhāne namagge ekaṁ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.16:52.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare naaññamaññe naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane pañca, nakamme satta, navipāke sattarasa, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.16:54.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṁ, anantare ekaṁ (saṅkhittaṁ), avigate ekaṁ. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.16:57.1_0: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—micchattaniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.16:58.1_0: Sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— sammattaniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.16:59.1_0: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—aniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.16:60.1_0: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā …pe…
patthana1.16:61.1_1: kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre tīṇi …pe…
patthana1.16:63.1_0: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho aniyato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ aniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.16:64.1_0: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—micchattaniyate khandhe saṁsaṭṭho micchattaniyatādhipati.
patthana1.16:65.1_0: Sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—sammattaniyate khandhe saṁsaṭṭho sammattaniyatādhipati.
patthana1.16:66.1_0: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho aniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— aniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.16:67.1_0: Sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—arūpe sammattaniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.16:68.1_0: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho aniyato dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—arūpe aniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.16:69.1_0: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati napacchājātapaccayā.
patthana1.16:70.1_0: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho aniyato dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā—aniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.16:71.1_0: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā, navipākapaccayā.
patthana1.16:72.1_0: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho aniyato dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā— pañcaviññāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana1.16:73.1_0: Sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—arūpe sammattaniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.16:74.1_0: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho aniyato dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—arūpe aniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.16:75.1_0: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, napurejāte dve, napacchājāte tīṇi, naāsevane ekaṁ, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke tīṇi, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, navippayutte dve.
patthana1.16:77.1_0: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā tīṇi, napurejāte dve, napacchājāte tīṇi, naāsevane ekaṁ, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke tīṇi, navippayutte dve.
patthana1.16:79.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṁ, anantare ekaṁ (saṅkhittaṁ), avigate ekaṁ. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.16:82.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— micchattaniyatā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:83.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— micchattaniyatā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:84.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—micchattaniyatā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:85.1_0: Sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana1.16:86.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—aniyatā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:87.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā micchattaniyate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.16:87.1_4: Micchattaniyatā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:88.1_0: Sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.16:88.1_2: Sammattaniyatā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:89.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ paccavekkhati, ariyā phalaṁ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:89.1_1: Ariyā aniyate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.16:89.1_4: vatthuṁ aniyate khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti abhinandanti, taṁ ārabbha aniyato rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana1.16:89.1_6: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena aniyatacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ viññāṇañcāyatanassa …pe…
patthana1.16:89.1_10: Aniyatā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:90.1_0: Aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— rūpajīvitindriyaṁ mātughātikammassa …
patthana1.16:90.1_4: Yaṁ vatthuṁ parāmasantassa micchattaniyatā khandhā uppajjanti, taṁ vatthu micchattaniyatānaṁ khandhānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:91.1_0: Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—nibbānaṁ maggassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:92.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:93.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:94.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:94.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—micchattaniyatādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:95.1_0: Sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:96.1_0: Sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.16:96.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.16:97.1_0: Sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:97.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—sammattaniyatādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:98.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.16:98.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, jhānā …pe…
patthana1.16:98.1_2: ariyā phalaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:98.1_5: aniyate khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā aniyato rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.16:98.1_6: **Sahajātādhipati**—aniyatādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:99.1_0: Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:100.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— micchattaniyatā khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:101.1_0: Sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—maggo phalassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:102.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā aniyatā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ aniyatānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:102.1_5: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:103.1_0: Aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— aniyataṁ domanassaṁ micchattaniyatassa domanassassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:104.1_0: Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—gotrabhu maggassa …
patthana1.16:105.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo (anantarasadisaṁ) …
patthana1.16:106.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:107.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.16:107.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—mātaraṁ jīvitā voropetvā tassa paṭighātatthāya dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti.
patthana1.16:107.1_5: saṅghaṁ bhinditvā tassa paṭighātatthāya dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti.
patthana1.16:108.1_0: Sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:108.1_2: tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:109.1_0: Sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.16:109.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—ariyā maggaṁ upanissāya anuppannaṁ samāpattiṁ uppādenti, uppannaṁ samāpajjanti, saṅkhāre aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti.
patthana1.16:110.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.16:110.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—aniyataṁ saddhaṁ upanissāya dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ …pe…
patthana1.16:110.1_3: samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti.
patthana1.16:110.1_15: kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:111.1_0: Aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.16:112.1_0: Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.16:112.1_2: catutthassa maggassa parikammaṁ catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:113.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana1.16:113.1_3: vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha aniyato rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana1.16:113.1_5: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe…
patthana1.16:114.1_0: Aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana1.16:115.1_0: Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:116.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo— pacchājātā micchattaniyatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:117.1_0: Sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:117.1_1: Pacchājātā sammattaniyatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:118.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—pacchājātā aniyatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:119.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā aniyatā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ aniyatānaṁ khandhānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:120.1_0: Aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—aniyataṁ domanassaṁ micchattaniyatassa domanassassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:121.1_0: Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—gotrabhu maggassa …
patthana1.16:122.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— micchattaniyatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:123.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.16:123.1_2: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—micchattaniyatā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:124.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—micchattaniyatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:125.1_0: Sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sammattaniyatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:126.1_0: Sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.16:127.1_0: Sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sammattaniyatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:128.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.16:128.1_1: **Sahajātā**—aniyatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:128.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—aniyatā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:129.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—vipāko aniyato eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ vipākapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.16:130.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.16:131.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.16:131.1_2: **Pacchājātā**—micchattaniyatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:132.1_0: Sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.16:132.1_2: **Pacchājātā**—sammattaniyatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:133.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.16:133.1_8: **Pacchājātā**—aniyatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:134.1_0: Aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:135.1_0: Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:136.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— micchattaniyato eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana1.16:136.1_1: dve khandhā dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:137.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.16:137.1_2: **Pacchājātā**—micchattaniyatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:138.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo—micchattaniyato eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.16:139.1_0: Sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…. (Tisso pañhā.)
patthana1.16:140.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.16:140.1_1: **Sahajāto**—aniyato eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.16:140.1_9: vatthuṁ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana1.16:140.1_11: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe…
patthana1.16:140.1_16: **Pacchājātā**—aniyatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:141.1_0: Aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:142.1_0: Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:143.1_0: Micchattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā micchattaniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.16:143.1_1: **Sahajāto**—micchattaniyato eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana1.16:144.1_0: Micchattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā aniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.16:144.1_1: **Sahajātā**—micchattaniyatā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:144.1_2: **Pacchājātā**—micchattaniyatā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:144.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—micchattaniyatā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:145.1_0: Sammattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā sammattaniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo …pe….
patthana1.16:146.1_0: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā aṭṭha, anantare pañca, samanantare pañca, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye satta, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā pañca, vigate pañca, avigate terasa.
patthana1.16:148.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.16:149.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.16:150.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:151.1_0: Sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.16:152.1_0: Sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.16:153.1_0: Sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:154.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.16:155.1_0: Aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.16:156.1_0: Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:157.1_0: Micchattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā micchattaniyatassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.16:158.1_0: Micchattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā aniyatassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.16:159.1_0: Sammattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā sammattaniyatassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.16:160.1_0: Sammattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā aniyatassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.16:161.1_0: Nahetuyā terasa, naārammaṇe naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare terasa, nasahajāte nava, naaññamaññe nava, nanissaye nava, naupanissaye terasa, napurejāte ekādasa, napacchājāte terasa, naāsevane terasa, nakamme navipāke naāhāre terasa …pe…
patthana1.16:161.1_1: namagge terasa, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte satta, noatthiyā satta, nonatthiyā terasa, novigate terasa, noavigate satta.
patthana1.16:163.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye satta …pe…
patthana1.16:163.1_1: namagge satta, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta.
patthana1.16:165.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā aṭṭha, anantare pañca, samanantare pañca, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye satta, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre satta, indriye jhāne magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā pañca, vigate pañca, avigate terasa.
